content.text: Responsive web design makes your web page look good on all devices.
content.html: Responsive web design makes your web page look good on all devices.

content.text: Responsive web design uses only HTML and CSS.
content.html: Responsive web design uses only HTML and CSS.

content.text: Responsive web design is not a program or a JavaScript.
content.html: Responsive web design is not a program or a JavaScript.

content.text: Designing For The Best Experience For All Users
Web pages can be viewed using many different devices: desktops, tablets, and phones. Your web page should look good, and be easy to use, regardless of the device.
content.html: Web pages can be viewed using many different devices: desktops, tablets, and phones. Your web page should look good, and be easy to use, regardless of the device.

content.text: Web pages should not leave out information to fit smaller devices, but rather adapt its content to fit any device:
content.html: Web pages should not leave out information to fit smaller devices, but rather adapt its content to fit any device:

content.text: It is called responsive web design when you use CSS and HTML to resize, hide, shrink, enlarge, or move the content to make it look good on any screen.
content.html: It is called responsive web design when you use CSS and HTML to resize, hide, shrink, enlarge, or move the content to make it look good on any screen.
